Title: Series: The Amarna Letters
Description: Clay cuneiform tablet; letter from Rib-Hadda to the king (of Egypt); 55 lines; writing clear but straggling; top edge worn away.
Bibliographic references: Knudtzon, J A 1915a / Die El-Amarna Tafeln (83)
Bezold 1892a / The El-Amarna Tablets in the British Museum (14)
Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.173)
Sigrist M et al 2006a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, III
Exhibition history: 2022-2023 14 Oct- 12 Mar, Leiden, Rijksmuseum van Oudheden, Byblos
Condition: Fair / poor; top edge worn away.
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
